description: Sequence remaining after fourth round of Flavius Josephus sieve; remove every fifth term of A056530.
crossrefs: Compare A000027 for 0 rounds of sieve, A005408 after 1 round of sieve, A047241 after 2 rounds, A056530 after 3 rounds, A056531 after 4 rounds, A000960 after all rounds.
After n rounds the remaining sequence comprises A002944(n) numbers mod A003418(n+1), i.e. 1/(n+1) of them.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 19 2000
